official_title: A bill to amend section 5155 of the Revised Statutes.

summary.text: Banking Convenience Act of 1985 - Permits a national bank to share, or permit its customers to use, an automated device that is not established by that bank. Declares that such automated device shall not be considered a branch of that bank.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5155 of the Revised Statutes.
